269929.「もしかして あなたが……フォーリオンに\n 連れてこられた者の中で 唯一\n:
Are you, by chance...the one who was brought
to Fourion but is still alive in Astoltia...?

269931.「天使たちから 聞いたんです。\n では あなたが……<pc>さんですね。:
I overheard it from the angels. Then you
must be...<pc>, right?

269932.「私は……名乗るほどの者では ありません。 \n どうとでも 好きなように 呼ん:
As for me...I'm not really someone worth
introducing. Please call me whatever you
like.

269933.「試練を受けろと ここに\n 案内されたは いいのですが……:
I was told to come here to undergo this trial,
but...

269934.「見たこともない植物が 生い茂っている\n 得体のしれない森ですからね……周囲の:
It's quite the strange forest with exotic
plants I've never seen before...I was scoping
out the surroundings up on a tree.

269935.「そうしたら ちょうど 天使から聞いていた\n 人相通りのかたが 通りかかったの:
Then, you showed up...since your appearance
matched that of what the angels had described,
I thought I should get your attention.

269937.「では 現代に生きる あなたに問いたい。\n 今はすでに 滅んでいるでしょうが…:
Say, I have a question... I know you live in the present day, so it's most likely gone by now, but have you ever heard of a country
called Yamakaminu?

269938.「えっ 知っているのですか。\n 聞いておいて なんですが……\n まさか ご存:
What? You actually know about it?
I must say, I'm pretty surprised that you
even know what it is.

269939.「聞いたことがない……ですか……。\n ならば いいのです。忘れてください。:
So you haven't heard about it, then...
No worries. Please forget I said anything.

269940.「それでは これにて。\n 奥に 花園のような 気になる場所があったので\n 試:
I should be on my way. I found an interesting
area that looks like a flower garden up that
way. I think the trial may be there.

269941.「まあまあ！ 英雄さんが\n ふたりも同時に いらっしゃるなんて\n 今度の試練:
Well, well! Two champions have arrived here
at the same time! The trial will be quite the
spectacle!

269942.「生誕の花園に ようこそ～！ \n 私は フェディーラと申します。\n 深翠の試:
Welcome to the Garden of Growth! You may
call me Fedira. I am the Angel of Judgment who
oversees the Deep Green Trial!

269943.「お待ちしていましたわ。ハクオウさん！\n <pc>さん！:
I've been expecting you both, Hakuo and
<pc>!

269944.「やれやれ……先ほどは 失礼いたしました。 \n 聞いての通り 私の名は ハクオ:
Good grief... I apologize for what I said
earlier. As you just heard, my name is Hakuo.

269945.「ほほほ！ それじゃ さっそく深翠の試練の\n 説明を 始めますわよ～！:
Ohoho! Okay! I'll begin by explaining to you
the Deep Green Trial!

269947.「ほぉ～らっ！ 見てください！\n とっても かわいいでしょ～！:
Wow! Just look at it! Isn't it just the
cutest thing?!

269948.「こちらは 英雄の魂のチカラを受けて育つ\n 特別な タマゴちゃんです！:
This special little eggy grows up by using the
power of a champion's soul!

269949.「このタマゴちゃんを ここ 深翠の試練場で \n 大切に育み 立派な姿に 成長さ:
Please nurture this eggy very carefully during
the trial, and allow it to grow up into
something marvelous! That is your trial!

269950.「育てて 成長させる……？\n 強敵を倒すでも 謎を解くでもなく……？:
Nuture...and grow...? Not defeating powerful
enemies or solving tricky riddles...?

269951.「そうで～す！ しかも 今回はおふたりの\n 英雄さんが 同時に来られたので\n:
Thaaaaaaat's right! And since two champions
arrived at the same time, I'll make a special
exception for you to cooperate together.

269952.「おふたりで チカラを合わせて タマゴちゃんを\n 育ててください！ どちらか片:
You two must work very hard to raise this
eggy! If just one of you fails, then you're
both disqualified! Cooperation is key!

269953.「それじゃ 目覚めの儀式として\n まずは このタマゴちゃんに\n ステキな名前:
All right, as part of its awakening ritual,
why don't we give this little eggy a fitting
name first?

269954.「はいッ！ ハクオウ父さん！\n タマゴちゃんの お名前は？:
Right! Hakuo, as a father, what will you name
your eggy?

269955.「いや……。\n 私には そういうのは 向いてません。\n あなたが 何か名前を:
No... I'm not really cut out for this sort of
thing. Why don't you give it a name...

269956.タマゴに 名前を つけてあげますか？<yesno><close>: Give a name to your egg?<yesno><close>

269958.「ダメですよ～！\n 私は ハクオウ父さんを 指名中です！\n ハクオウ父さん:
Aw, too bad! Well, I'm nominating you, new
father Hakuo! What will you name your eggy?

269961.「まあ～！ コウリンちゃん！\n と～っても ステキなお名前ですね！: Wow! Kourin! What a marvelously lovely name!

269962.「それじゃ お名前を呼びながら\n おふたりで カラをノックして\n タマゴちゃ:
Okay. Let's give it a little knock while
calling out its name, so the little eggy can
wake up!

269965.「あららら～？\n そぉ～んなに 失格になりたいのかしら～？:
Heeeeyyy. You don't want to be disqualified,
do you?

269966.「ぐっ……仕方ありませんね……。: Ggh... I guess I have no choice...

269969.「オトウたま！ オカアたま！\n これから よろしくタマ～ッ！: Daddy! Mommy! I'm so happy to meet you!

269970.「ふたりの オトウたま！\n これから よろしくタマ～ッ！: I'm so happy to meet both of my daddies!

269971.「うふふ！ コウリンちゃん ヨロシクね～！\n これで 目覚めの儀式は 終了です:
Ehehe! Little Kourin, it's nice to meet you
too! And with that, the awakening ritual has
been completed!

269972.「では お次に～！ \n コウリンちゃんを育てるために \n 大切なお水と 食べ:
As for your next task...! Please gather some
food and water for your little Kourin here!

269973.「まずは お水から！\n 豊穣の密林には たくさん草木が生えてます。\n その葉:
Let's start with water! There are many plants
and trees in this forest. Collect every drop of
dew from the leaves you can find!

269974.「この密林には 霊力があふれていますからね。\n それが凝縮された朝露は コウリ:
This forest is chock full of spiritual energy.
The condensed dew from that energy is very
important for Kourin's growth!

269975.「やるべきことは わかりました。: I understand what must be done.

269976.「私は その朝露を 集めてきますので\n 食べ物の方は あなたに お任せします。:
I will go and collect the dew, and leave the
collection of food to you. See you soon.

269978.「では <pc>さんには\n コウリンちゃんにあげる 食べ物について\n くわし:
Listen carefully, <pc>! I'll explain
more about the food you'll be giving to little
Kourin!

269980.「やっぱり ダイヤココナッツタマーー！！\n オカアたま 取ってきてくれて\n:
I knew it! Diamond Coconuts!!!
Thank you for bringing this to me, mommy!
I'm so eggcited!

269981.「やっぱり ダイヤココナッツタマーー！！\n オトウたま 取ってきてくれて\n:
I knew it! Diamond Coconuts!!!
Thank you for bringing this to me, daddy!
I'm so eggcited!

269984.「アガガッ……おかしいタマ！\n 全ッ然 歯が立たないタマッ！:
Aaaaaahh...thatsh weird! I can't bite into
thish at all!!

269985.「ほほほ！ そりゃあ そうですわ～。\n ダイヤココナッツのカラは ドラゴンの牙:
Ohoho! That's right. A Diamond Coconut's shell
is so hard, not even the fangs of a Green
Dragon can bite through it!

269986.「中身を食べるには そんな硬いカラを \n どうにかして 砕かなくてはなりません:
If you want to eat what's inside, you have
to find a way to break the shell.
...right, Hakuo?

269987.「今度は 花の蜜をたくさん 集めてきましたよ。\n 一輪の花から取れる蜜が あま:
I brought back some nectar this time. A single
flower barely gave me any, so it took me some
time to gather enough of it.

269988.「おや 何か お困りのようですね。\n どうされましたか？:
Oh, is there something wrong? Can I help
somehow?

269989.「カラが硬くて 中身が食べられないと……。 \n そういうことなら 私でも 役に:
So the shell is too hard for it to be
edible... I think I may be able to help with
that.

269990.「食べ物の方は <pc>さんに\n 任せきりでしたからね。\n ここは 私に や:
You took care of gathering the food, so let
me handle this.

269991.「ちょっと お借りしますよ。: Please let me see this for just a moment.

269992.「どれほど硬くとも 物質の継ぎ目を突けば\n 切れぬものなど ありません……。:
No matter how hard something may be...if you
can find a seam in its material, you should
have no problem cutting through it.

269994.「食べやすくなるように 切ってみましたが……\n どうでしょうか？:
I cut it up for you so it's easier to eat...
What do you think?

269995.「す……すっごいタマーーッ！！ \n あんなに硬かったカラが\n 真っ二つに な:
E...eggscellent!!! You cut through that really
hard shell like it was nothing!

269996.「ふ ふあああ……この香り！\n 辛抱タマらん！ いただきタマ～！:
Phew...that scent! I can't take it anymore!
I gotta eat it!

269997.「うふふ。 \n ハクオウ父さんが 集めてきてくれた 花の蜜も\n ちゃ～んと:
Hehe. Make sure to also drink the nectar that
your father collected for you!

269999.「わあ～！ 見て見て！\n ボク 飛べるようになったタマ！:
Wooow! Look, look! I can fly now!
I'm so eggscited!

270000.「おほほ 順調のようですわね～。\n ここまで来れば コウリンちゃんが\n 大人:
Ahaha! Things are progressing smoothly.
You're on your way to becoming a big and
strong grown up, little Kourin!

270001.「豊穣の密林の奥にある 命脈の神殿へと進み\n コウリンちゃんが 大人になるため:
Deep in this forest lies a temple called the
Threads of Life. It is here that little Kourin
will undergo his passage to adulthood.

270002.「命脈の神殿は 危険な場所ですが…… \n コウリンちゃんの がんばりどころです:
The Threads of Life is quite dangerous...but
Kourin must go to do his best. It's a parent's
job to trust in their children.

270003.「やったぁ～！\n ボク ついに大きくなれるタマ～！: Yaaaay! I can finally be a grown up!

270004.「確かに 密林の南東に 建物がありました。 \n 私では 扉を開けることができ:
I did find a structure in the southeast part
of the forest, but was unable to go inside.
You're saying Kourin will help us to proceed?

270005.「では <pc>さん。 \n 命脈の神殿の前で 落ち合いましょう。:
Okay, <pc>. Let's meet in front of
the Threads of Life.

270006.「お待ちしていましたよ。\n おそらく これが 命脈の神殿への扉でしょう。:
I hope I didn't keep you waiting too long.
Perhaps this is the door that leads inside the
temple...

270008.「タマママっ！？\n 何もしてないのに 勝手に開いタマ！:
Wooooah! I didn't have to do anything!
I just opened all by itself!!

270009.「おそらく コウリンにしか \n 開けないように 何かしらのまじないが\n かか:
Perhaps the door was locked with some kind
of spell, and would only open if Kourin were
to be in front of it...

270010.「扉が開いたってことは 強いオトナになる \n 資格アリってことタマ！？\n う:
The door opened, and you know what that
means! I can become bigger and stronger!!
I'm so eggscited! Let's hurry and go inside!

270011.「フェディーラたまから 聞いたタマ！ \n オトウたまは 世界中に その名をとど:
Fedira told me all about you! Were you really
the greatest swordsman in the world, dad?

270012.「戦場で 剣を振るうオトウたまを見た敵は\n 一目散に 逃げていくほど すごかっ:
I heard you were so good, that your enemies ran for cover when they saw you holding your sword! When you sliced that coconut, I knew
it had to be true!

270013.「ボクも オトウたまのような 強いオトナに \n なるタマ！ それで オトウたま:
I'm gonna become a strong man just like you,
dad! Then we can fight any battle together!
Just you watch me!

270014.<center>どんな戦場でも お前と一緒なら 怖くない。\n頼りにしているぞ:
No matter the battlefield, I am not afraid as
long as I am by your side. I am counting on
you, Hakuo.

270015.「私ひとりが どれほど強くとも…… \n 戦場では……意味なんて ありませんでし:
No matter how strong I was on my own...
On the battlefield...it meant nothing...

270016.「この先は 何が起こるか わかりません。 \n お互い 油断は禁物ですね。:
We have to be vigilant for what's to come.
Let's not let our guard down.

270017.「……コウリンは まだ幼く か弱い。 \n 急いで 追いかけましょう。:
Kourin is still young and fragile...
Let's hurry and chase after him.

270018.<center>この先は 天稟の祭壇……。\nお前が 神の使者となるに足る存在か:
Beyond lies the Altar of Aptitude...
Prove to us that you are worthy of being
a messenger of the gods...

270019.「タダでは通してくれませんか……。 \n では 私が お相手しましょう。:
I suppose we have no choice but to fight...
Very well. I shall be your opponent!

270020.「かかってこいタマ～ッ！ \n お前らを倒して 強いオトナになってやるタマ！:
Come on, come on! I'm gonna crack you, beat
you, and scramble you so I can become big and
strong!

270023.「やはり あなたには まだ 早すぎます！\n 私の後ろに 隠れていてください！:
It's still too early for you to be rushing
ahead like that! Please stay behind me!

270026.<center>我らを圧倒する そのチカラや 見事！\nあとは 祭壇が 答えを出:
The power that overpowers us is a thing to
behold! The Altar will answer for the rest.
...and you may pass.

270027.「……もう 大丈夫そうです。 \n コウリン 出てきても いいですよ。:
It looks like it's going to be fine now.
Kourin, it's okay if you come out.

270029.「ボクだって 役に たちたいタマよ……。: I want to be useful, too, you know.

270030.「あなたは まだ弱く 幼い。 \n 何かあってからでは 取り返しがつきません。\:
You are still weak and young. You can't take back what you have lost until something happens. It is not too late to fight, even
after you become stronger.

270031.「祭壇はもう 目の前です。 \n さあ 儀式をおこないましょう。:
The Altar is right in front of us. Let's
perform the ritual.

270033.「この祭壇に 願えばいいタマか？ \n えっと……ボク……強いオトナになりたいタ:
Is it okay if I make a wish at this altar?
Um...I...I want to become a strong adult!

270034.「タ タマママ……！ カラダが 熱く……: Tamama! My body is so hot.

270035.「……ない？ あれ？ \n もう 終わっちゃったタマ？\n ボク 何か 変わった:
No... no? Huh? Is it over already? Did
something change in me?

270037.……どこからともなく\n審判の天使 フェディーラの声が 聞こえてきた！:
...Out of nowhere I hear the voice of Fedira,
the Angel of Judgement!

270038.<center>残念ですが……コウリンちゃんは\n真の姿を授かることが できませ:
I am sorry... but Kourin could not receive
his true form. For the time being, you must
return to me.

270039.「そ そんな……嫌タマ！！: Oh, no, I don't want to...!

270040.「ボク 絶対に強くなって オトウたまと一緒に\n 戦うって決めたんタマーーッ！:
I've decided that I'm going to get stronger
and fight alongside you, tama!

270042.「いえ……今は 何を言っても……。 \n おとなしく 戻りましょう……。:
No... no matter what I say... now...
let's just go back...

270044.「あなたは 何も悪くありません。\n 私の魂が 英雄に相応しくないから……\n:
There is nothing wrong with you. It's just
that my soul is not worthy of a hero, and I'm
sure it's affected yours as well.

270045.「よくぞ 戻りましたね！\n ひとまず ３人とも無事で 何よりです。:
Thank God you're back! For the time being, I'm
glad to hear that all three of you are safe.

270046.「ですが……\n 残念ながら コウリンちゃんが\n 大人になる儀式は 失敗してし:
But...alas, Kourin's ritual of becoming an
adult failed.

270047.「ハクオウさん。\n あなたは コウリンちゃんを守ろうとするあまり\n 成長する:
Mr. Hakuo. You were so intent on protecting
Kourin that you deprived them of the opportunity
to grow up.

270049.「あなたには ハクオウさんの欠けた部分を\n 埋めてくれることを 期待したのです:
I had hoped that you could fill in some of the
missing pieces for Mr. Hakuo.

270050.「本来ならば これで 失格ですが\n 私は ハクオウさんが背負う 深い傷について:
Normally, this would disqualify you, but I
understand the deep hurt that Mr. Hakuo is
carrying.

270051.「もちろん コウリンちゃんの 切なる願いにも。\n よって もう一度だけ あなた:
And, of course, to Kourin's earnest wish.
Therefore, I will give you all one more
chance.

270052.「さあ 各々 この天命の水晶ビンを\n 受け取りなさい。:
Now each of you receive this Fate's Crystal
Vial.

270053.<pc>たちは それぞれに\n天命の水晶ビン（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<:
<pc> and the others each received
a Fate's Crystal Vial (Key Item)!<me 60>

270054.「このビンを持って 密林のモンスターを倒せば\n 少しずつ 生育の星砂が貯まりま:
If you take this bottle and defeat the monsters in the jungle, you will gradually accumulate star sand for growth. This is the
key to Kourin's growth.

270055.「ですが 星砂は た～くさん 必要なので\n <pc>さんと ハクオウさんも そ:
However, we need a lot of star sand, so please
collect a bin full of star sand for each of
you, too.

270056.「生育の星砂を 集めてくればいいタマね！？\n よおおおし！ オトウたま オカア:
Just get me some star sand for my
growth, and I'll be an adult! All right!
Watch my parents!

270057.「生育の星砂を 集めてくればいいタマね！？\n よおおおし！ オトウたまたち\n:
Just get me some star sand for my
growth, and I'll be an adult! All right!
Watch my parents!

270059.「待ってください！\n ひとりで行くのは あまりに危険……: Wait! It's too dangerous to go alone...

270060.「ほらほら ダメですよ～！\n また ハクオウさんの良くないクセが\n 出ていま:
Look, look, you can't do that~! Hakuo's bad
habit is showing again!

270061.「ほほほ！ そうですよ。\n 子の冒険を見守るのも 親の役目ですからね。:
Ho ho ho! That's right. It's a parent's role
to watch over their children's adventures.

270062.「さあ あなたたちも 試練に集中！\n しっかり 星砂を集めてくるんですよ。\n:
Come on, you guys. Focus on the trials! Gather
the star sand. Have a good day!

270063.「まあ～！ おかえりなさい！ \n ビンに 生育の星砂は 集まりましたか？:
Oh my gosh! Welcome back! Did you collect the
growing star sand in the bin?

270064.<cs_pchero>は 満タンの天命の水晶ビンを\nフェディーラに渡し 突然現:
<cs_pchero> gave Fedira a full Tan Tan
Fate's Crystal Vial and reported on the sudden
appearance of Slime Unknown.

270065.「試練場で 今まで 見かけなかったモンスターが\n 出現するようになった？ 私は:
Are there any new monsters appearing in the trials that we haven't seen before? I don't know, but maybe that's why the star sand is a
little red?

270066.「それに 満タンのように見えますが \n どういうわけか まだ 星砂のチカラが\:
And although it looks like Fate's Vial is full,
somehow it still seems to lack the power of
star sand.

270067.「コウリンは まだ戻っていないようですね。\n 星砂を集めながら 姿を探したので:
Kourin doesn't seem to be back yet. I looked
for him while collecting star sand, but
couldn't find him...

270068.「うふふ！ ほ～ら！ \n それは 心配しなくても 大丈夫そうですわよ。:
Uh-huh! There you go! That looks like you
don't have to worry about it.

270069.「ま 間に合っタマ……。\n ボクだって 生育の星砂 集めたタマよ……。:
Well, you're just in time, because I'm the one
who collected all the star dust of growth.

270070.「コウリン！ 無事でよかった。\n 心配していたんですよ。:
Kourin! I'm glad you're safe. I was worried
about you.

270071.「タマママ～ッ！\n ビンに満タン 集めたタマ！:
Tama mama! Filled the bottle
with star sand!

270072.「見て見て！ オトウたま！\n ボクだって がんばったタマよ！:
Look, look, look! Look Dad! I did
my best!

270073.「ひとりで これだけ集めるなんて\n 苦労したでしょうに 無茶をして……:
It must have been hard for you to collect all
this by yourself, but you did it recklessly...

270074.「そういうところは\n よく 似るのですね……。:
I see that we are very similar in that
respect...

270075.「まあ～！ よくがんばりました！ \n 皆さんが 集めてくれた分を 合わせたら\:
Well~! You did a great job! If I combined all
of you who helped me collect, I'd have a full
Fate's Vial, no question!

270076.「生育の星砂には 皆さんの \n 魂のチカラが 凝縮されています。\n これを合:
The star sand of growth contains the power of
your souls. If I put them together and add a
little work...

270077.「さあ ググっとイッキに いっちゃいましょう！\n これで コウリンちゃんも\n:
Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go! This
will definitely make Kourin-chan a grown-up!

270078.「やったーー！\n オトウたま オカアたま！\n チカラを貸してくれて ありがと:
Yes! Dad, Mom! Thank you so much
for lending me your help, Tama~!

270079.「やったーー！\n オトウたまたち！\n チカラを貸してくれて ありがとうタマ～:
Yay! My dads! Thank you so much for
helping us, Tama~!

270081.「タ タマママ……。\n 今度こそ カラダが熱いタマ……: Tama mama... now my body is hot...

270083.「なんだ……？ \n この背筋が寒くなるような 異常な気配は……。:
What the...? This unusual, spine-tingling
feeling...

270085.「そんな……！ コウリンちゃんに\n いったい 何が……！？: Oh, no...! What happened to Kourin?

270087.「来ます！ <cs_pchero>さん\n ひとまず コウリンを 鎮めますよ！:
It's coming! <cs_pchero> For now,
Kourin, calm down!

270089.「コウリン！ 目を覚ますんです！\n 私と共に 戦うのではなかったんですか！:
Kourin! Wake up! I thought you were going to
fight with me!

270090.<center>お前は 並外れて 強いからな。\n皆を守らねばと 気負うのもわか:
You are exceptionally strong. I know you're
anxious to protect everyone, but you should
have more faith in us.

270091.「ふふっ……。\n あの時の お前も\n 同じ気持ちだったのだろうな。:
Hmmm... I guess you must have felt the same
way at that time.

270093.「コウリン……。\n あなたを 暴走させているのが\n 信じてもらえなかった無念:
Berserk Kourin... if what's driving you to run
amok is your regret at not being believed...

270095.「私を倒せば その怒りは晴れ \n もとのあなたに 戻れるのでしょうか……。:
If you defeat me, will your anger dissipate
and will you return to your former self?

270096.このままでは ハクオウが危ない！\n助けにいきますか？<yesno><close: Hakuo is in danger! Shall we go help?<yesno><close>

270099.<center>俺は お前と共に 戦いたい。\n一緒なら 何倍も強くなれると 信:
I want to fight with you. I believe that
together we can be many times stronger.

270100.<center>ボクだって 役に たちたいタマよ……。: I want to be useful, too, you know.

270101.「かつて あれほど後悔したというのに\n 私は……何も 学んでいなかったようです:
I had regretted it so much in the past, but I
guess I... didn't learn anything.

270105.「そうだ……ボク……。\n ダイヤココナッツを……オトウたまに……\n 切って…:
That's right...me... I received...a diamond
coconut...cut by....my father...

270106.「コウリン！ 正気に戻ってください！\n 私だって あなたと 共に戦いたい……\:
Kourin! Please come to your senses! I want to
fight with you too... and I want you to let me
try again!

270107.「ううっ……！\n オトウたまの剣技が……かっこよくて……\n ボクも……一緒に:
Ugh...! Dad's swordsmanship... was so
cool... that I wanted to fight with him.

270108.「コウリンの心をむしばむ 悪しきチカラ。\n 今なら この剣で……。:
The evil power that is devouring Kourin's
heart. Now, with this sword...

270110.「あ……あれ？\n ボク……どうしちゃってたの……？: What's going on? What's wrong with me...?

270111.「タマっ！？ ボク 変わってる？\n もしかして 大人になれたの！？: Have I changed? Did I just grow up?

270112.「コウリン……よかった。\n 今のあなたは とても立派な姿ですよ。:
Kourin...good. You are looking very
respectable now.

270113.「本当……？ やったぁ！\n これで 父さんと一緒に戦えるかな？: Really...? Yes! Now I can fight with my dad?

270116.「こうして コウリンを助けられたのは\n あなたのおかげです。\n 本当に……あ:
It is thanks to you that I was able to save
Kourin in this way. Thank you so much.

270117.「私はかつて 仲間の犠牲を恐れるあまり \n 己のチカラを見誤り……\n 大いな:
I was once so afraid to sacrifice my
companions that I misjudged my own strength
and took on a great enemy single-handedly...

270118.「そして 敗れ……命を落としました。 \n そのせいで 私の祖国……ヤマカミヌ:
And I lost... I lost my life. Because of
that, my homeland... the Kingdom of
Yamakaminu, was destroyed.

270119.「私は ６０００年前 世告げの姫により\n 災厄の王を倒すために 見出され\n:
I was found 6,000 years ago by the Oracle
Princess to defeat the King of Calamity, and I
am the heir to the throne of time.

270120.「そして あなたにつけた \n その コウリンという名は\n 私の親友だった者の:
And the name I gave you, Kourin, is the name
of a good friend of mine.

270121.「ほほほ！\n 一時は どうなることかと思いましたが\n どうにか 試練は 合格:
Ho-ho-ho! For a while there, I was afraid of
what might happen, but somehow, you passed
your trial!

270122.「３人とも 本当に お疲れ様でしたわ～。\n さあ 合格のご褒美を お渡ししなく:
I thank all three of you for your hard work!
Now, I have to give you your reward for
passing!

270123.<cs_pchero>が持つ\n魂の燭台に 炎が灯った！:
The Soul Candle held by <cs_pchero> has been
lit!

270124.「あれ おかしいな……。\n 安心したら……なんだか すごく眠く……:
I feel strange... and when I feel relieved, I
feel very sleepy...

270125.「コウリン！？ なぜ……無事に\n 大人になれたのでは ないのですか？:
Kourin! Why... didn't you make it to adulthood
in one piece?

270126.「おそらく 我を失い 暴れたことで \n チカラを使い果たして しまったのです。:
Perhaps when he lost his mind, he ran out of
energy. Kourin needs some rest.

270127.「ですが コウリンちゃんならば \n 必ずや 元に戻ってくれるでしょう。\n そ:
But I'm sure Kourin will get back to normal.
Until then, let's wait for him.

270128.「コウリン……。\n 共に戦える日を 楽しみにしていますよ。:
Kourin I look forward to the day when we can
fight together.

270129.「あなたにも ずいぶん面倒を \n おかけしてしまいました。:
I am very sorry for all the trouble I have put
you through.

270130.「一度は 試練を失敗してしまった私に\n 慈悲を与えていただき……感謝いたします:
Thank you for having mercy on me once I failed
my trials...and thank you.

270131.「あらあら～！ \n ずいぶん 素直になっちゃいましたわね！: Oh my goodness! You've become so honest!

270132.「ですが……最後に ひとつだけ忠告します。 \n コウリンちゃんの暴走は\n 私:
But...one last piece of advice. Kourin's
outburst was not a trial I intended.

270133.「生育の星砂を集める際に 得体の知れない\n 魔物が 紛れ込んでいたようですが\:
It seems that an unknown monster was mixed in with the star sand that was being collected, and that may have been the cause of the
outburst...?

270134.「今回の試練の裏に よくない思惑を感じます。\n くれぐれも この先 気を付ける:
I sense some bad intentions behind this trial.
You must be very careful in the future. I will
report this to the Archangel as well.

270135.「それでは 先に進むのです。 \n 私もここから 見守っていますからね。:
Then go ahead. I will be watching over you
from here.

270136.「試練では あなたに \n ずいぶんと お世話になりました。\n 改めて 礼を言:
I want to thank you again for all the help you
gave me during the trials. Let me thank you
again.

270137.「この先でも 我らの道が\n 再び交わることを 願っています。:
I hope our paths will cross again in the days
ahead.

273978.深翠の試練に 合格した。\n四天の星巡りを すべて終えるために\n残りの試練に:
I have passed the Deep Green Trial. Let's
try the remaining trials to complete the Four
Heavenly Trials.

273979.すべての試練に合格し 四天の星巡りを達成した！\n神都フォーリオンの聖天区画へ進:
You have passed all trials and completed the Four Heavenly Trials! Let's go to the Holy Grounds of the Celestial City Fourion and meet
the Archangel!

278602.「ボクだけ逃げるなんて いやタマ～！\n ボクだって 戦って 強いオトナになるタ:
Don't just leave me behind! I have to fight
to become big and strong! You'll fight with
me, won't you mom?<yesno><close>

278603.「ボクだけ逃げるなんて いやタマ～！\n ボクだって 戦って 強いオトナになるタ:
Don't just leave me behind! I have to fight
to become big and strong! You'll fight with
me, won't you dad?<yesno><close>

278604.「何かあってからでは 遅いのです。\n 危険から コウリンを守ることが \n 親:
If something were to happen now, it would be
too late. It's our role as your parents to
protect you from any dangers, Kourin.

278605.「ええ。コウリンは まだ幼すぎます。\n 危険から コウリンを守ることが \n:
That's right. Kourin, you're still much too
young. It's our job as your parents to protect
you from any danger.

278606.「ここは 私たちに任せて\n あなたは 隠れていてください！:
We'll handle this! Stay behind us and out
of sight!

278607.「今度こそ コウリンちゃんには 自分のチカラで\n 成長してもらいます。生育の星:
This time, Kourin, you will grow by your own
power. You will collect star sand until the
jar is full.

278610.「コウリンちゃん。\n あんなにも 荒ぶったチカラを\n よく おさえ込みました:
Little Kourin. How did you manage to
suppress such wild energy?

278611.「ハクオウ父さんと 共に戦いたいという\n 強い信念があったからこそ あなたは\:
It was your strong conviction to fight alongside Father Hakuo that allowed you to quell your outburst and grow into a divine
beast.

283976.「そうですよ～！\n 私は ハクオウ父さんを 指名中です！\n ハクオウ父さん:
That's right! I'm nominating you, Father
Hakuo! Father Hakuo, what's your egg's name?
